level.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: This subchapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C.§ 7001 et seq.) ("Act"), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that Act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c)), or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b)).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under § 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 20 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
